title: Machine Robo: Butchigiri Battle Hackers
synopsis: A ship crewed by earthlings crashes on Chronos. Believing themselves stranded, the crew volunteers to fight along the Machine Robos.
related_anime: ['Lightning Trap: Leina & Laika', 'Machine Robo: Cronos no Dai Gyakushuu', 'Shutsugeki! Machine Robo Rescue', 'Machine Robo: Leina, The Legend of Wolf Blade']
